name: Prosciutto and Tomato Salad With Smoked Mozzarella Croutes
recipeYield: Two main-course or four first-course servings
keywords: appetizer, side dish, mixed salad, prosciutto, sun-dried tomato, nut-free
recipeIngredient: 8 thin slices prosciutto, cut across into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place tomatoes in a small saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer until softened, about 5 minutes. Drain. In a large bowl, toss together tomatoes, salad greens and prosciutto.
In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, salt and pepper. Place the bread on a baking sheet and top each piece with a slice of mozzarella. Bake until the cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
Toss the salad with the dressing and divide between 2 or 4 plates. Divide the croutes between the plates and serve immediately.
